name: girly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal often disapproving (of a person) enjoying things typically connected with women or girls, for example, make-up or the colour pink: Is your man more girly than you?girly girl My sister has always been a very girlie girl, not like me.
informal involving women and girls or considered typical of women or girls: girly weekend We're going on a girly weekend together to the health spa!girly stuff I go shopping a lot with friends and I love bags, shoes and all that girly stuff.girly chat We had a real girlie chat.
usually disapproving typical of or suitable for a female child: Sometimes she speaks in this silly, girlie voice. Her parents kept her room the same—her girly bed, her posters. Synonyms
childish
girlish
old-fashioned (of a magazine, picture, etc.) showing women wearing few or no clothes: I can recall factory workspaces with girly calendars. She found a stack of girlie magazines under his bed.
informal a woman or a girl: I play with friends and it doesn't matter to me whether they are blokes or girlies. All the girlies love him.
